name: stormjs
description: StormLib for Javascript, powered by Emscripten

scripts.build: npm run build:stormlib && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: cpx "build/stormlib.*.js" dist/ && BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src/lib/ --out-dir dist/
scripts.build:esm: cpx "build/stormlib.*.js" dist/ && BABEL_ENV=esm babel src/lib/ --out-dir dist/ --keep-file-extension

author: Wowser Contributors
